mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking(campnum, user_num, reservid, id, facltnm, audult_no, child_no, price, reservday, checkin, checkout)SELECT campnum, user_num, #{reservid}, id, facltnm, #{audult_no}, #{child_no}, #{totalprice}, sysdate, #{startDate}, #{endDate} FROM camp_info, member where campnum=#{campnum} and id=#{id}
